subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Valtteri Filppula and Nicklas Lidstrom scored in the first period, helping Detroit get started in a 4-1 victory over visiting Calgary in Game 1 of their first-round playoff series.
snippet: Valtteri Filppula and Nicklas Lidstrom scored in the first period, helping Detroit get started in a 4-1 victory over visiting Calgary in Game 1 of their first-round playoff series.
